Burn.description: The target takes fire damage at the end of each of its turns.

Freeze.description: The target's speed is reduced by 5 feet per point of potency.

Shock.description: A jolt of electricity interrupts the target, reducing their next attack roll by 1 per potency.

Bleed.description: The target suffers ongoing bleeding. When the target takes weapon damage, Bleed deals its potency as bonus damage and loses 1 duration.

Crush.description: The target suffers a reduction in Armor Class equal to its potency.

Vulnerable.description: Attacks against the target deal additional damage equal to potency.

Courage.description: The target gains temporary heroic resolve equal to potency (temporary HP).

Might.description: The target gains a bonus to damage rolls equal to potency.

Focus.description: Enhanced accuracy and precision. Grants +potency to attack rolls and increases critical damage by potency.

Guarding.description: The target adopts a defensive stance, reducing incoming damage by potency.
